abstract: Speculation that HSBC, the British bank, might bid for Société Générale of France resurfaced on Wednesday as an impending $8 billion capital increase by Société Générale loomed in the background.
lead_paragraph: Speculation that HSBC, the British bank, might bid for Société Générale of France resurfaced on Wednesday as an impending $8 billion capital increase by Société Générale loomed in the background.

headline.main: Chatter of an HSBC Bid for SocGen Resurfaces
